entry.title: Climate Change Forces the French to Alter the Way They Make Wine
entry.content: Growers are changing grape varieties and reshaping the landscape to protect some of the world’s most valuable vineyards from warmer temperatures.

entry.title: Pushing East of Kupyansk, Ukrainian Forces Expand Offensive
entry.content: Securing the remaining Russian-held urban areas on the town’s eastern side would clear the way for Ukrainian forces to push into Luhansk, one of the regions that Moscow seeks to annex through snap referendums under way.
